item.title: matcha.css | Drop-in semantic styling library in pure CSS
item.description: Drop-in semantic styling library in pure CSS. Ideal for fast prototyping, static HTML pages, Markdown-generated documents, and developers seeking to streamline their workflow without delving into CSS intricacies and want to make use of the full range of available HTML elements.
